thread.section_title: Lilium Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good location and friendly staff
thread.title_full: Good location and friendly staff - Review of Lilium Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: jadee89
title: Good location and friendly staff
text: Hotels was on the third floor and you definitely want to use the lift to access the hotel. The room itself was a good size, small amount of noise during the night from the road outside. The location of the hotel is near to the termini station. There is also some tourist attractions nearby the hotel and it's close to the starting point if the big bus tour stops.
